java/liquibase/preconditions/SqlPrecondition.java

00001 package liquibase.preconditions;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.DatabaseChangeLog;
00004 import liquibase.database.Database;
00005 import liquibase.database.DatabaseConnection;
00006 import liquibase.exception.PreconditionFailedException;
00007 import liquibase.exception.PreconditionErrorException;
00008 
00009 import java.sql.ResultSet;
00010 import java.sql.SQLException;
00011 import java.sql.Statement;
00012 
00013 public class SqlPrecondition implements Precondition {
00014 
00015     private String expectedResult;
00016     private String sql;
00017 
00018 
00019     public String getExpectedResult() {
00020         return expectedResult;
00021     }
00022 
00023     public void setExpectedResult(String expectedResult) {
00024         this.expectedResult = expectedResult;
00025     }
00026 
00027     public String getSql() {
00028         return sql;
00029     }
00030 
00031     public void setSql(String sql) {
00032         this.sql = sql;
00033     }
00034 
00035     public void check(Database database, DatabaseChangeLog changeLog) throws PreconditionFailedException, PreconditionErrorException {
00036         Statement statement = null;
00037         ResultSet resultSet = null;
00038         DatabaseConnection connection = database.getConnection();
00039         try {
00040             statement = connection.createStatement();
00041             resultSet = statement.executeQuery(getSql());
00042             if (!resultSet.next()) {
00043                 throw new PreconditionFailedException("No rows returned from SQL Precondition", changeLog, this);
00044             }
00045             String returnString = resultSet.getString(1);
00046             if (resultSet.next()) {
00047                 throw new PreconditionFailedException("Too Many rows returned from SQL Precondition", changeLog, this);
00048             }
00049 
00050             if (!expectedResult.equals(returnString)) {
00051                 throw new PreconditionFailedException("SQL Precondition failed.  Expected '"+expectedResult+"' got '"+returnString+"'", changeLog, this);
00052             }
00053 
00054         } catch (SQLException e) {
00055             throw new PreconditionErrorException(e, changeLog, this);
00056         } finally {
00057             try {
00058                 if (resultSet != null) {
00059                     resultSet.close();
00060                 }
00061             } catch (SQLException e) {
00062                 ;
00063             }
00064             try {
00065                 if (statement != null) {
00066                     statement.close();
00067                 }
00068             } catch (SQLException e) {
00069                 ;
00070             }
00071         }
00072     }
00073 
00074     public String getTagName() {
00075         return "sqlCheck";
00076     }
00077 }
